org.dellroad.stuff.validation

Annotation Type HostOrIP


  • @Documented
@Constraint(validatedBy={})
@Target(value={METHOD,FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Pattern(regexp="^((([\\p{Alnum}]([-\\p{Alnum}]*[\\p{Alnum}])?)\\.)+([\\p{Alpha}]([-\\p{Alnum}]*[\\p{Alnum}])?))|(([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5]))$")
public @interface HostOrIP
    Validation constraint requiring a String to be either a valid fully-qualified DNS hostname or an IPv4 address.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<?>[] groups 
      java.lang.String message 
      java.lang.Class<? extends Payload>[] payload
